function ERI_EP05_02()
    --.起-1【12月第4週】「理想は潰え、声は届かず」
    SaveData.Title = "理想は潰え、声は届かず"

    --//BG：病室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    MSG([[ When I woke up, I was in a familiar place. ]])

    MSG([[ It was Marika’s hospital room. She was still sleeping in bed just as before, with a vase of red roses beside her. ]])

    MSG([[ And on the floor right next to her, a woman I know well was bowing deeply toward Marika. ]])

    MSG([[ Noticing my presence, the woman slowly stood up and turned to face me. ]])

    --//BU：ダリア（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0252.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Looks like you’ve awakened.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0733.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Daria-san.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Daria looked a little worn out. Her eyelids were red and swollen, as if she had been crying until just a moment ago. ]])

    MSG([[ Seeing her like that, I gradually recalled what had happened to me. ]])

    MSG([[ Ah, that’s right. After winning the Princess Election against Daria-san, in front of the whole school, my crossdressing was exposed. ]])

    MSG([[ By Daria-san’s mother—Nemesia Himegami’s hand. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0253.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Aren’t you going to hit me? You have that right. There’s no one watching now. Go ahead and raise your fists as much as you want.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0734.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “What good would doing something like that do?” ]])

--;吉　テキスト修正「裏切り続けてた」→「裏切り続けていた」（2020/02/02 00:23）
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0735.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “I kept betraying everyone’s trust. That just became public. It’s my own fault. I have no reason to hate you.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0736.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “More importantly, what about an apology to my sister? Please wake Marika up quickly.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0737.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “I deceived everyone and betrayed their trust for Marika’s sake…!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0254.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “I’ve apologized. The whole day you were unconscious, I kept doing so.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0255.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “I exhausted every word. I cried all the tears I had held back, pressed my forehead to the floor, and apologized from the bottom of my heart.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0256.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “But… she hasn’t woken up.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0738.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Huh?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I didn’t understand what Daria meant and staggered closer to her. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0739.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “You cornered Marika, didn’t you? That’s why she won’t wake up, right?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0740.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “You said if you apologized, she’d wake up, right? So why…?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0257.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “I only said there was a chance she’d wake up. No, I wanted to believe that if I apologized, Marika would wake up.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0741.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “What do you mean…?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0258.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “There might be a factor I don’t know about…something other than my betrayal.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0259.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “I kept looking away from that possibility and avoided apologizing.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0260.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “Because thinking Marika might not wake up… scared me.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0742.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “W-What’s that supposed to mean?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0743.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “So there’s no clue left to wake Marika up!? What am I supposed to do now!? Please tell me!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I impulsively grabbed Daria but quickly let go. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0744.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “S-Sorry… I’m just upset.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ No good. Throwing a tantrum like this won’t help. ]])

    MSG([[ I understood from how she apologized with all her heart that Daria was sincere. ]])

    MSG([[ What I need to face now is the reality that Daria’s apology alone can’t wake Marika up. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0745.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Y-You said you’d tell me everything, right?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0746.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Is there… no clue at all? I want to save Marika no matter what.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0747.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Any clue will do! I’ll do anything for my sister!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",100,false)

    --//CG：晒された戦姫の正体
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV023ab")
	LAYER_LOAD(10, "EV023ab")
	LAYER_ALPHA(10,30)
	LAYER_EFFECT(10,6,80,80,2000,false)
	FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    --//effect：セピア調

	FILTER_SCREEN(0)
	LAYER_LOAD(10,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0748.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Anything, I’ll…” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I remembered that there was nothing I could do anymore. ]])

    MSG([[ My crossdressing was found out, and the false princess “Erika Ikusa” died. ]])

    MSG([[ Of course, I can’t go to Yuriai Private Academy anymore. There’s nothing left I can do. It’s hopeless. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s all over now. ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0749.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Ah… aaaaah…” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Tears welled up all of a sudden. No matter how much I wiped them, they wouldn’t stop. ]])

    MSG([[ The despair of being unable to save Marika. The guilt of betraying everyone who trusted me. ]])

    MSG([[ Regret for not noticing the malice that tried to trap me. ]])

    MSG([[ All sorts of emotions flooded in like a torrent, and I couldn’t control myself. ]])

    MSG([[ It was the first time in my life I ever wanted to disappear so badly. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0261.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “...I’ll tell you the truths I know another day.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0262.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “I’ve arranged with the hospital, so for now, spend as much time as you want with Marika to heal your sadness.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0263.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 “The time you can spend with Marika… will surely be very short.” ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --//SE：引き戸の開閉音（すーっ）
PLAY_SE("SEb004.wav")
WAIT(800)

    --//CG：姉にすがるミナト
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV024aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ The moment Daria left the hospital room, I couldn’t hold back any longer and hugged Marika’s still sleeping body. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0750.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Sister… I’m sorry…” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0751.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “I just couldn’t protect you, Marika… I’m really, really sorry…” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0752.wav")
    -- 【ミナト】
    -- 「ごめんなさい……ごめんなさい……ごめんなさい……ごめんなさい……ごめんなさい……ごめんなさい……ごめんなさい……」
    -- //ボイスだけ。テロップはなし。

    MSG([[ No matter how much I apologized, there was no response. Nothing was different from before I entered Yuriai Private Academy. In the end, what I did was meaningless, wasn’t it? ]])

    MSG([[ I only deceived, betrayed, and caused pain to everyone at Yuriai Private Academy. ]])

    PLAY_VOICE("minato_0753.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Marika… what should I do… please tell me, Marika.” ]])

    MSG([[ I held Marika’s hand, but she didn’t squeeze back like before. ]])

    MSG([[ Alone in the hospital room, I kept talking to myself pointlessly. ]])

    MSG([[ Endlessly. ]])

    MSG([[ Endlessly. ]])

    MSG([[ Endlessly………………. ]])
    --　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(2000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(2000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERI_EP05_03")
end
